dishes.name: Uthappizza
dishes.label: Hot
dishes.description: A unique combination of Indian Uthappam (pancake) and Italian pizza.

dishes.name: Zucchipakoda
dishes.description: Deep fried Zucchini coated with mildly spiced chickpea flour batter.

dishes.name: Vadonut
dishes.label: New
dishes.description: A quintessential ConFusion experience, is it a vada or is it a donut?

dishes.name: ElaiCheese Cake
dishes.description: A delectable, semi-sweet New York Style Cheese Cake, with Graham cracker crust.

comments.comment: Imagine all the eatables, living in conFusion!
comments.author: John Lemon

promotions.name: Weekend Grand Buffet
promotions.label: New
promotions.description: Featuring mouthwatering combinations with a choice of five different salads, six enticing appetizers, six main entrees and five choicest desserts. Free flowing bubbly and soft drinks. All for just $19.99 per person

leaders.name: Peter Pan
leaders.description: Our CEO, Peter, credits his hardworking East Asian immigrant parents who undertook the arduous journey to the shores of America with the intention of giving their children the best future.
